Name: Two Seasons Coron Bayside Hotel
Amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room
OtherData: The town has successfully managed to preserve the historic district where you can still find calesas (horse-drawn carriages). Sample the famous and delicious Ilocos empanada, and walk along cobbled streets lined up with souvenir shops selling pottery and Abel Iloko weaves,
CustomerReview: "I really like to commend the service provided by this hotel especially the Front Office team for always accommodating our concerns!Very nice and approachable Front desk officers Aly, Yna and Kourtney!!Kudos to Bellmen Oli and Marco in assisting and guiding us!Also to Kuya Mcdo who is very enthusiastic and drove us safely from airport to hotel and vice-versa!
